description:
Built light in weight and big on style, the Sydney will keep your head from overheating and provide your face with shade. Many subtle colours are woven into a thin braid that coils to form a breathable crown.

  • Made of 100% polyester, including the internal headband
  • Generous, 10cm brim provides lots of shade for your face and neck
  • An internal drawstring lets you adjust the crown to get the fit just right
name: Wallaroo Sydney Hat - Women's
